Module com.example.helloworldjfxtemplate
Package com.example.helloworldjfxtemplate.controller

Class CustomerController

java.lang.Object
com.example.helloworldjfxtemplate.controller.CustomerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomerController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controls the implementation of the Customer adding and modifying FXML forms. Includes validation for adding and modifying Customers.

      public CustomerController()

  • Method Details

    • setCustomerToModify

      public static void setCustomerToModify(Customer toModify)
      Gives the CustomerController access to the Customer to be modified.
      Parameters:
      toModify - Customer passed by the MainController to be modified.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the CustomerController by obtaining Country information from the database to populate the ComboBox. If the user is modifying a Customer, the fields will be prefilled with the relevant information.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The URL of the FXML file.
      resourceBundle - Used for localized resources such as languge files and images.

    • onClickNameField

      public void onClickNameField()
      Gathers the name string from the TextField. Shows an alert and prevents saving on failure to gather a string.

    • onClickAddressField

      public void onClickAddressField()
      Gathers the address string from the TextField. Shows an alert and prevents saving on failure to gather a string.

    • onClickPostalField

      public void onClickPostalField()

    • onClickPhoneField

      public void onClickPhoneField()
      Gathers the phone string from the TextField. Shows an alert and prevents saving on failure to gather a string.

    • onClickCountry

      public void onClickCountry()
      Gathers the selected country from the country ComboBox. Shows an alert and prevents saving if the ComboBox was not populated. Depending on the selected country, it also sets the items for the division ComboBox.

    • onClickSave

      public void onClickSave(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException, IOException
      Handles the saving of Customers created or modified within the form. They are then stored within the database.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - This ActionEvent is generated by the save button, and is used for the context to go back to the main form.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exception thrown in cases where the Query and ResultSet handling fails.
      IOException - Exception thrown in cases where the destination of the main-menu is inaccessible.

    • onClickCancel

      public void onClickCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Handles the Cancel button which allows the user to discard any input on the form and return to the main-menu scene.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - ActionEvent given by the cancel button, used to navigate back to the main-menu scene.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception thrown in cases where the main-menu fxml is unreachable.

    • setModify

      public static void setModify(boolean modify)
      Boolean that indicates whether the form should be blank for adding a Customer, or populated for modification.
      Parameters:
      modify - Boolean passed by the Main Scene.
